I'm halfway through step 1 of phase 1 of Java Gladiator plan:
http://home.w=
indstream.net/melvinsh/gladiator/GladMapDraw1.htm
displays 1st half of the =
graphics.  I ran into a snag because I can't
seem to get my java applet to =
read binary files (so I could loop
through reading the tile graphics into m=
emory) or I would be finished
with this phase by now.  I had to use the gif=
 versions of the tile
graphics in this so that's why a few things are messe=
d up.

Pardon me for asking this relatively stupid question: which file(s)
=
contain directions for drawing the objects on the map?
